name: Pull Google Ads metrics from DataForSEO API to Google Sheets
description:
This template regularly checks Google Ads keyword metrics via DataForSEO API, and uses the retrieved information to update rows in Google Sheets. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module. 
The template uses this [Example Spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JguGVDC0KsplJmSI2eUHBlUf65xRAXB01MGx6BziyFc/edit?usp=sharing). If you want to use a different Spreadsheet, note that your Spreadsheet is expected to have these columns: Keyword, Location, Language. If you donâ€™t have these columns in your Spreadsheet, you will need to either create them or map different existing columns relevant to you.
